SEARCH
Module org.calcmvc
Package org.calcmvc.controller

Class CalcController<T>

java.lang.Object
org.calcmvc.common.misc.MyConcreteObservable
org.calcmvc.common.operation.CalcCommonBase
org.calcmvc.controller.CalcController<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Operand type for concrete children classes
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyCommand, MyObservable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CalcLongController
public abstract class CalcController<T> extends CalcCommonBase
Abstract class describing a global calculator independent of any type of operands. Any concrete calculator dedicated to a specific operand type should extend this class. This class is part of the tuple Calc[Model/View/Controller]. This class runs a loop to:
  • display the available operations
  • interact with the user
  • compute the result of the operation
The loop stops when the user chooses to quit the application.
Author:
x. skapin
